CustomField.description: MC; R1813150; This field needs to be updated accordingly with its counterpart on account
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "Office 365"), "Office 365" + BR() , NULL)+ IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "MS Office (includes Outlook)"), "MS Office (includes Outlook)" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "QB Online"), "QB Online" + BR() ,Null) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "QB Desktop"), "QB Desktop" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "G Suite (includes Gmail)"), "G Suite (includes Gmail)" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "Dropbox"), "Dropbox" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "Other"), "Other" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "WordPerfect"), "WordPerfect" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "Sharepoint"), "Sharepoint" + BR() , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Account.Other_Productivity_Tools__c , "Paper System"), "Paper System" + BR() , NULL)
CustomField.label: Other Productivity Tools
